title: Pyke + Frozen heart
body:
There is a bug with pyke + frozen heart.

it has like infinit range (nearly full board) + after his ult the effect of frozen heart triggers again (stackable).

A unit which has like idk 1.2 Attackspeed goes down to ~0.05 that way.

Please fix fast :)

replies.body: yea.. a guy just got 1st place because he stacked 2x frozen hearts on his pyke..... would have been an easy win for me otherwise... but bugs > Strategy i totally reported his ass... though i doubt anything comes of it...
If someone does that just place an Ionic spark on Garen and put another Garen in play. It'll proc from the bench till Pyke is dead ;)

it isnt like pyke ist just ulting, he will maybe use it 2-3 times, still thats enough so your Units wont do anything for the rest of the match.

Even if Pyke dies the effect of frozen heart continues

Oh wut, it continues even after death? Well guess it's completely unbeatable then, that sucks.

I did just read a twitter anouncement that they'll be hotifixing it (might even be today) together with Akali always critting and reverting cho's spell damage, so hurray!

It is useable on any champ, it stacks which means 3x -25% well.. guess we all know what happoens then.. rapidfire, Phantom Dancer, Bloodthirster Vayne lvl 3 with 0 Attackspeed wuh.. if that shit doesnt get fixed untill tomorrow evening then riot is sleeping tho.

Yeah I just played a game where a Pyke had 3 frozen hearts, and my entire team sat there doing nothing.  My rageblade stacked Vayne had .25 AS.  I didn't manage to check the other units, but the entire board was effected by the frozen hearts.
